author: Senko12
install_msg: âœ… StreamRelay cog installed! Use `!load streamrelay` to activate.
name: StreamRelay
short: Relays Discord messages to a web page with M3U8/YouTube playback.
description: A cog that connects Discord chat to a web player via Socket.IO, allowing users to switch streams with !chan, add new channels with !add, stop streams with !stop, and view available channels with !guide.
